001-next-layout-for-screen.description: Next layout for the current screen (Suggested  Alt+Shift+h)

002-prev-layout-for-screen.description: Previous layout for the current screen (Suggested  Alt+Shift+l)

100-move-up.description: Move current window up in the stack (Suggested Alt+Shift+k)

101-move-down.description: Move current window down in the stack (Suggested Alt+Shift+j)

200-increase-primary.description: Move the primary window bigger (Suggested Alt+Shift+i)

201-decrease-primary.description: Make the primary window smaller (Suggested Alt+Shift+u)

900-swap-primary.description: Swap current window with primary window (Suggested Alt+Shift+m)
